getChannels.description: A global action that converts the currency of each plan to the shop's currency.

getSlackAuthRedirect.description: A global action used to create a redirect URL which starts the Slack OAuth flow.

ShopPage.jsx.description: The main page of the app. Auth start and channel selection page.

shopifyShop.description: The default Shopify shop model with additional Slack related fields.

setSlackChannel.description: Sets a new channel id on the shop record. It will first leave the previous Slack channel if a channel id exists.

uninstall.description: Removes the Slack channel id from the shop record if on is set.

create.description: Sends a notification to a merchant's chosen channel if: the action trigger is a webhook; the merchant has gone through the Slack OAuth flow; and the merchant has set a Slack channel.

slack/GET-callback.js.description: The URL that continues the subscription flow when a merchant accepts a plan's terms.

shopifyShop.description: The read and setSlackChannel permissions allow the merchant to read information about the current subscription and set the current channel where notifications are sent.

webflow.title: Slack notifications
webflow.description: Send order transaction notifications to your preferred Slack channel.
